name: Pierre Laperdrix
content: Pierre Laperdrix About Me I am currently a full-time researcher (Chargé de Recherche, HDR) for CNRS in the CRIStAL laboratory. I am working in the SPIRALS team on computer security and privacy with a touch of software engineering. Previously, I was a postdoctoral researcher in the PragSec lab at Stony Brook University and, after, in the Secure Web Applications Group at Cispa. I obtained my PhD working on browser fingerprinting in the DiverSE team at INRIA Rennes where I developed the AmIUnique.org and Fingerprint Central websites.
